name: Space Invader - File Explorer Edition
description:
This game is my group's entry to the Ludum Dare 42 jam. It was made in 48 hours but it is a Jam submission, not Compo.

Almost every single asset was recreated from scratch except:

  • System sounds
  • Wallpapers
  • A few file previews

Made entirely with Unity 2018 with no third-party packages aside from TextMeshPro.

---------- Gameplay ----------

If you need any help with the gameplay, fetch some from the Help screen of the Start menu.
